snippet.title: Ancient: Legacy of Azul - Releasing Feb 4th, 2022 (Trailer)
snippet.description:
Cosmic Spud's first big game, Ancient, is coming out Feb 4th, 2022. This sidescrolling action rogue-lite, will be available on PC, on both Steam and itch.io. 

Wishlist now on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1661920

Also coming to itch.io:
https://cosmic-spud.itch.io/ancient

Keep up to date on development on our subreddit:
https://www.reddit.com/r/CosmicSpud/

Also tune into our Twitch on launch day:
https://www.twitch.tv/cosmic_spud_official

Get a taste of more of Ancient's soundtrack by MatthewMartinoMusic:
https://youtu.be/Tj4nNGq0Hec

#AncientGame
Ancient was given the full name of Ancient: Legacy of Azul after this trailer was created. They are one and the same.
